    • net.minecraftforge.common中EventBus的使用

      声明为EventBus的net.minecraftforge.common中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static EventBus MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS
      The core Forge EventBusses, all events for Forge will be fired on these, you should use this to register all your listeners.
      static EventBus MinecraftForge.ORE_GEN_BUS 
      static EventBus MinecraftForge.TERRAIN_GEN_BUS

    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler中EventBus的使用

      net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler中EventBus的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  FMLThrowingEventBus
      Event bus that allows exceptions thrown by the exception handler to propagate.
      参数类型为EventBus的net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void EventBus.handleException(EventBus bus, Event event, IEventListener[] listeners, int index, java.lang.Throwable throwable) 
      void IEventExceptionHandler.handleException(EventBus bus, Event event, IEventListener[] listeners, int index, java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Fired when a EventListener throws an exception for the specified event on the event bus.
